title: Attend Georgia RV and Camper Show and Stay at Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta
text:
Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta offers convenient lodging to vendors and guests attending the Georgia RV and Camper Show on September 11-13, ATLANTA, GA, September 04, The Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta, a popular Doraville GA hotel , offers convenient accommodations to vendors and guests attending the Georgia RV and Camper Show. The event will be held September 11-13 at the North Atlanta Trade Center in Norcross, Georgia. Dealers will have over 100 models of RVs and travel trailers at the show including motor homes, truck campers, pop up campers, and Fifth Wheels. This is an excellent opportunity for buyers to compare the different types of RVs available. Admission is $8 for adults.
"Our Doraville hotel is just a ten minute drive from the North Atlanta Trade Center," notes Samuel Head, the new General Manager at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta. "We are happy to offer convenient lodging for the Georgia RV and Camper Show," continues Head.
Guests will enjoy clean and comfortable guest rooms at the Clarion Hotel and Conference Center. A sofa sleeper, microwave, and refrigerator are available in some rooms, and high speed Internet is free. Small pets are welcome. The refreshing outdoor pool is the perfect place to relax after a busy day. Other amenities meeting rooms, fitness center, and coin laundry. Onsite dining is convenient at Clarion's new restaurant, Perimeter Bar & Grille. A complimentary weekday shuttle is available within a three mile radius including the Doraville MARTA Station. Downtown Atlanta, the Buckhead shopping district, and the airport are easily reached by MARTA train.
The Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta participates in the Choice Privileges reward program, enabling members to earn points toward free hotel nights. AAA, military, and senior rates are available. This north Atlanta hotel is located near the intersection of I-85 and I-285.
For more information and directions to the Georgia RV and Camper Show, visit www.northatlantatradecenter.com Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta, call 770-455-3700 or visit online at www.northatlantahotel.com .
About Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta
The newly opened Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta is located just off I-285 at Exit 32 near Doraville and is conveniently located 14 miles from downtown Atlanta. This north Atlanta hotel was built with features and amenities to ensure you'll truly have a great stay with us including complimentary Wi-Fi, meeting and convention space, seasonal outdoor pool and pet-friendly lodging. Guests will enjoy their stay at Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta by Choice Hotels. The property participates in the Choice Privileges rewards program.
For more information visit www.northatlantahotel.com
